biotools.summary: GeneTrail analyzes gene sets for statistically significant accumulations of genes belonging to functional categories.  Two common statistical approaches are implemented including: Over-Representation Analysis (ORA) for comparing a reference set of genes to a test set; and, Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (GSEA) for scoring sorted lists of genes.

bioschemas.name: GeneTrail
